text: ywm alqiamat yshtd al'amr wyseb hwlh, wayati allah taealaa lifasl alqada' bayn alkhlayq, fayakshif ean saqih alkarimat alty la yshbhha shy', qal salaa allah ealayh wslm: "ykshf rabana ean saqh, fysjd lah kl muwmin wmwmnt, wybqa man kan yasjud fi aldnya; rya' wsmet, fayadhhab lysjd, fyewd zahrih tbqana wahdana" rwah albkhary wmslm
